description.en:
The crag above the Sava River near the town of Brestanica is characterized by overhangs and overhanging slabs and is well worth a visit.

Summer, otherwise from early spring to autumn. The routes on the right take longer to dry.
The land above the road is exposed to the risk of stonefall and landslides. There is a road under the wall
so try not to dislodge any rock.
description.sl:
Obiska vredno plezališče nad reko Savo pri Brestanici nudi predvsem plezanje v previsih in previsnih ploščah.

Poletje, sicer pa od zgodnje pomladi do jeseni. Po daljšem dežju ostanejo smeri v desnem delu še nekaj časa mokre.
Teren nad cesto je izpostavljen padajočemu kamenju in plazenju. Zaradi ceste pod steno ne prožimo kamenja.

description.en:
An excellent crag above Baška grapa with wonderful views. The rock is nicely featured but takes a little getting used to.
The turning for the crag, when coming from Tolmin, is situated at the end of the village Ljubinj, only 100 m ahead from the turning for Kobala and planina Razor.
Early spring to late autumn, but climbing on dry, sunny winter days can also be great (especially in the mornings). In the summer, the C and D sectors come into shade after 3 p.m.
Close the gates!
description.sl:
Odlično plezališče na razglednem robu nad Baško grapo. Smeri potekajo v dobro razčlenjeni skali, na katero pa se je treba sprva privaditi.
Odcep za plezališče iz smeri Tolmin je na koncu vasi Ljubinj, le 100 m naprej od odcepa za Kobalo in planino Razor.
Od zgodnje pomladi do pozne jeseni
tudi suhi zimski dnevi so ob dopoldanskem soncu lahko povsem prijetni. Poleti sta sektorja C in D v senci po 15 h.
Zapiraj lese!

description.en:
The climbing area lies at the foot of the southern slopes of the Krim, south of Ljubljansko barje. Just above the river Iška the local climbers have climbed and protected many slabs and overhangs with small holes.
The first sector is nearly always a bit wet.
Late spring to early autumn. In the afternoon the crags are shaded by the trees.
Climbers are asked to park at the mountain hut, even if the barrier is up.
description.sl:
Plezališče v Iškem Vintgarju leži na južni strani Ljubljanskega barja pod južnimi pobočji Krima. Tik ob reki Iški so lokalni plezalci plošče in previse z luknjicami že na gosto opremili s svedrovci.
Prvi sektor je skoraj vedno nekoliko moker.
Od pozne pomladi do zgodnje jeseni. Popoldne so stene v senci.
Parkirajte pri domu, čeprav je rampa včasih dvignjena.

description.en:
In the narrowest part of the gorge, above the left bank of the River Savinja rises the Igla (Needle). A rocky tower was named after a tiny crevasse in its flank, which was once the only way that led to the Logarska dolina. The locals named the crevasse the Eye of the needle.

From May to October.
description.sl:
V najožjem delu soteske se nad levim bregom Savinje dviga Igla. Skalnati stolp je ime dobil po ozki špranji v njegovem boku, skozi katero je nekoč vodila edina pot proti Logarski dolini. Domačini so jo poimenovali Šivankino uho.

Od maja do oktobra.

description.en:
The routes are predominantly overhanging and sustained.
The crag is small, but worth a visit.

April to October. An ideal summer crag, after 10 a.m. in shade.
Don't block the road and access roads. The crag lies on private ground, with a meadow and a stream in the vicinity. Dogs must be kept on a lead.
description.sl:
Prevladujejo rahlo previsne, vzdržjivostne smeri.
Plezališče je majhno, a vredno obiska.

Od aprila do oktobra. Idealno poletno plezališče, v senci po 10. uri.
Ne zaparkiraj ceste in dovoznih poti. Stena leži na privatni zemlji, v neposredni bližini sta pašnik in potok. "Štirinožne soplezalce" na vrvice!

description.en:
The climbing area is situated in the vicinity of the village Čolnišče above Zagorje ob Savi.

From late spring to autumn. It is an ideal summer crag exposed to the sun untill 13.00.
It is obligatory to park in front of the inn Vrtačnik at Čolnišče. Should this agreement with the locals not been respected, we risk closure of the climbing area.
description.sl:
Plezališče leži v bližini vasi Čolnišče nad Zagorjem ob Savi.

Od pozne pomladi do zgodnje jeseni. Idealno poletno plezališče s soncem do 13. ure.
Parkirajte obvezno na parkirišču pri gostilni Vrtačnik v Čolnišču. Tak je dogovor z vaščani in nespoštovanje tega lahko pripelje do zaprtja plezališča.

routes.name: Ja mami, sej se bom uču

description.en:
In the vicinity of the Vršič pass above the path toward the Zavetišče pod Špičkom Hut rise the smooth slabs of good rock. With their altitude and surroundings they can be considered as an alpine climbing area.
Accommodation
Mountain huts at the Vršič pass: Erjavčeva koča, Poštarska koča, Tičarjev dom.

Summer.
A double rope is recommended for descent from the multi-pitch route. There is a danger of falling stones in the sector Stripoteka.
description.sl:
V neposredni bližini Vršiča se tik nad potjo proti Zavetišču pod Špičkom dvigajo gladke plošče z dobro skalo, ki s svojo nadmorsko višino in okoljem segajo že v visokogorje.
Prenočišče
Vršič: Erjavčeva koča, Poštarska koča, Tičarjev dom

Poletje.
Za sestop po smeri z več raztežaji je priporočljiva dvojna vrv. V sektorju Stripoteka obstaja nevarnost padajočega kamenja.

description.en:
The easily accessible crag is situated in the middle of the forest above the old frontier guardhouse in the Logarska dolina. It's been re-equipped with glue-in bolts recently.
From 27th April to 1st November it is necessary to pay the entrance to the Logarska dolina Landscape Park.
From May to October. In summer, the crag is in shade after 3 p.m.
description.sl:
Lahko dostopna stena se nahaja v gozdu tik nad nekdanjo karavlo v Logarski dolini. Plezališče je preopremljeno z lepljenimi klini in sidrišči.
Od 27. aprila do 1. novembra se za motorna vozila plača vstopnina v Krajinski park Logarska dolina.
Od maja do oktobra. Stena je poleti v senci po 15. uri.

description.en:
A small and popular crag on a ridge between the valley of Poljanska dolina and the basin of Idrijska kotlina with nice views and good rock. The routes are short and intense. Most of them (including the less popular B sector) have been re-quipped with glue-in bolts.

Spring and autumn
in the summer, the wall comes into shade after 4 p.m.
description.sl:
Majhno, a dobro obiskano plezališče na slemenu med Poljansko dolino in Idrijsko kotlino odlikujeta lepo okolje in dobra skala. Smeri so kratke in intenzivne. Večina, tudi v manj obiskanem sektorju B, je preopremljenih z lepljenimi klini.

Pomlad in jesen, poleti je stena v senci po 16 h.

description.en:
The crag has a very local character and is situated in the immediate vicinity of the centre of Škofja Loka. The rock is conglomerate. Many easier routes are suitable for beginners but the unique (and in places quite polished) rock takes some getting used to.

Spring, autumn and dry and sunny days in winter. It is too hot in summer.
description.sl:
Plezališče je izrazito lokalnega značaja in se nahaja v neposredni bližini centra Škofje Loke. Stena je konglomeratna, vrsta lažjih smeri pa zanimiva za začetnike. Na specifično skalo se je potrebno malce navaditi, pa še skala je ponekod že precej zlizana.

Pomlad in jesen ter sončne in suhe zime. Poleti je čez dan prevroče.

description.en:
The crag of Luknja near the village of Prečna provides the only climbing opportunity in this area. Even though it doesn't see too much traffic, it's nicely bolted and well maintained. The rock in sector A is quite blank with limited holds. The right part of the crag is slightly overhanging and the routes are mostly short and intense with pretty good handholds. The grades of some routes (especially the shorter ones) are quite stiff.

Spring to autumn. In the summer, the thick trees provide welcome shade.
description.sl:
Plezališče Luknja pri Prečni je edino v okolici dolenjske prestolnice. Kljub manjšemu obisku je plezališče dobro vzdrževano in opremljeno. Skala v sektorju A je precej gladka in skopa z oprimki. Desni del je rahlo previsen, smeri pa večinoma kratke in intenzivne z boljšimi oprimki. V nekaterih, predvsem krajših smereh so ocene navite.

Od pomladi do jeseni. Poleti drevesa poskrbijo za senco.

description.en:
In the immediate vicinity of the idyllic source of the Ljubljanica River there rises a very overhanging wall. The routes are well protected.

From late spring to mid autumn. In the Summer, it is pleasantly cool.
description.sl:
V neposredni bližini izvira Ljubljanice se v idiličnem okolju dviga previsna in dobro opremljena stena.

Od pozne pomladi do srede jeseni. Poleti je prijetno hladno.

description.en:
The main characteristics of the crag are cracks and well-featured overhangs. Some routes remain dusty after the summer storms.
The climbing area is situated in a deep V-shaped valley of the Polskava River on the dome-shaped Pohorje. It differs from the other crags for its rock, which is untypical for Slovenia - gneiss, a metamorphic rock that resembles granite. It is a local crag of the climbers from Maribor and Slovenska Bistrica.

Spring, summer and autumn. In the summer the walls are mostly shaded by the trees. It is possible to climb also during the sunny winter days. After periods of rain the sector F remains wet for a long time.
The crag is on private land! Behave properly and regardfully towards the owner, who lives above the crag.
description.sl:
V plezališču se pleza po počeh in razčlenjenih previsih. Nekatere smeri so po poletnih nevihtah dokaj zaprašene.
Lokalno plezališče mariborskih in bistriških plezalcev leži v globoki debrski dolini Polskave na sicer kopastem Pohorju. Izstopa zaradi svoje, za slovenska plezališča netipične kamnine - gnajsa, metamorfne kamnine, ki nekoliko spominja na granit.

Pomlad, poletje, jesen. Poleti so stene večinoma v senci dreves. Plezati je možno tudi ob sončnih zimskih dneh. Predvsem sektor F po deževnih obdobjih ostane dalj časa vlažen.
Plezališče je na privatnem zemljišču! Naj opozorimo na kulturno in nemoteče obnašanje, predvsem do lastnika, ki stanuje nad plezališčem.

description.en:
A well protected crag with good rock offers diverse climbing.

From spring to late autumn. The crag faces south, so it is possible to climb also during dry winters. In the summer the wall remains in the shade and the additional refreshment is provided by the fresh air, coming out of the cave under the wall.
description.sl:
Dobro urejeno plezališče poleg kvalitetne skale nudi tudi zelo raznovrstno plezanje.


Od pomladi do pozne jeseni. Zaradi južne lege je mogoče plezati tudi v suhih zimah. Poleti je stena v prijetni senci, za dodatno hlajenje pa poskrbi hladen zrak, ki veje iz jame pod samo steno.

description.en:
This excellently maintained crag with mostly easier routes near the town of Brestanica is the only in the area and is therefore very popular.

All year round.
The parking area has room for fifteen cars. If it's full, you can park at the swimming pool in Brestanica.
description.sl:
Odlično urejeno plezališče z lažjimi smermi pri Brestanici je edino na tem koncu in posledično zelo obiskano.

Vse leto.
Pod plezališčem je prostora za 15 avtomobilov. Če je parkirišče polno je najbližje uradno parkirišče poleg bazena v Brestanici. Informacije: www.pak.si

description.en:
A summertime crag with long and attractive routes and a steep approach, which is hidden in a forest in the middle of Radovna. Most of the routes are quite difficult and suitable for experienced climbers. The upper part of the crag is overhanging and you can climb there in light rain, and the lower part of the wall has slightly overhanging routes with good handholds. All the routes have been re-equipped.

Summer. It's not too hot in the mornings due to the coldness of the valley, and the wall comes into shade after 12 o'clock. Spring and autumn are also good during periods of prolonged dry weather.
Park at the hand-shaped monument. Cross the bridge, hop over the fence, follow the stream (upstream), and continue along the cart track. After the track levels out, head right up a steep forest to get to the path leading to the crag.
description.sl:
Poletno plezališče z dolgimi in lepimi smermi ter strmim dostopom je skrito v gozdu sredi doline Radovne. Kljub nekaj lažjim smerem je prava izbira pred-vsem za tiste, ki se gibljejo v zgornjem delu težavnostne lestvice. Zgornji del je precej previsen in omogoča plezanje tudi v dežju, v spodnjem delu pa smeri večinoma potekajo po rahlo previsnih razčlembah z dobrimi oprimki. Smeri so preopremljene.

Poleti. Zjutraj za hlad poskrbi dolina, po 12 h pa senca. Spomladi in jeseni v suhih obdobjih.
Parkiramo ob spomeniku v obliki roke. Dostop do stene vodi preko mostu, čez ograjo in preko travnika ob potoku in po kolovozu navzgor. Ko se ta položi, zavijemo desno strmo skozi gozd, dokler ne stopimo na shojeno pot, ki vodi do plezališča.

description.en:
A nice crag has been recently re-equipped with glue-in bolts. The whole place is still being developed.

From spring to autumn.
Park in front of the church in Vinska Gora
the parking space is shared with ferrata Gonžarjeva peč.
description.sl:
Plezališče je bilo pred kratkim preopremljeno z lepljenimi klini. Nove smeri še nastajajo.

Od pomladi do jeseni.
Parkiraj pri cerkvi v Vinski Gori, kjer je tudi parkirišče za ferato Gonžarjeva peč.

description.en:
Vertical and slightly overhanging routes with good holds prevail.
The crag at the foot of Rombon offers a fine view of the Bovec basin. Easier routes prevail and the crag is very appropriate for beginners.


Park at the right side of the road, 50 m beyond a concrete water trough. The trail leads through the folds. It is essential to close the gates!
description.sl:
Prevladujejo navpične in rahlo previsne smeri z dobrimi oprimki.
Plezališče ob vznožju Rombona odlikuje lep razgled na Bovško dolino. Prevladujejo lažje smeri, tako da je Kegl primerna izbira za začetnike.

Pleza se vse leto. Poleti so stene v senci popoldne.
Parkira se na desni strani ceste, 50 metrov za betonskim koritom za vodo. Pot nas vodi skozi ograde za drobnico! Obvezno zapirajte lese za seboj.

description.en:
The white walls with a steep approach are hidden in the Završnica Valley at the foot of the southern slopes of Stol in the Karavanke mountain range. The highest wall is 80 m high and has several multi-pitch routes. All the routes require precise footwork. A great place for every climber who enjoys steep slabs with tiny hand and footholds.

All year round, except during the coldest and the warmest months.
Watch out for snakes in the summer. The rock is loose in places.
description.sl:
Pod pobočji Stola se v dolini Završnice skrivajo bele stene s strmim dostopom. Najvišja med njimi sega do 80 metrov visoko in nudi tudi več raztežajev dolge smeri. Dobra tehnika gibanja pride tu bolj do izraza kakor moč. Prava izbira za ljubitelje strmih plat, majhnih oprimkov in preciznega stopanja.

Vse leto, razen ob najhladnejših zimskih in najtoplejših poletnih dnevih.
Pod steno lahko poleti naletite na kače. Skala je mestoma krušljiva.

description.en:
The excellently equipped crag on the slopes of Kum caters mainly to good climbers, but it's a little hard to find due to the poorly visible approach path. The wall is about 100 meters down from the parking area, just across from the cement factory. From the parking area, follow the path leading right to some benches. Continue left down a poorly visible cart track, which narrows into a path lower down. Follow this leftward-arcing path to the base of the crag.


Summer and early autumn.
description.sl:
Odlično opremljeno plezališče na pobočju Kuma je primerno predvsem za boljše plezalce, ga je pa trenutno zaradi slabo označene poti malo težje najti. Stena leži dobrih 100 višinskih metrov pod parkiriščem, tako rekoč nasproti cementarne. S parkirišča sledimo stezi proti desni do klopc. Od tu nadaljujemo levo navzdol po slabo nakazani vlaki, ki nižje preide v stezo, ta pa nas v polkrogu proti levi pripelje pod steno.

Poleti in zgodaj jeseni.

description.en:
A low face with many nice features is hidden behind the trees near the road that winds along the Soča River from Nova Gorica towards Bovec. The rock is very good. A new sector has recently been opened (Zgornji sektor), where climbing is possible throughout the year. The approach to this sector is very steep.

From early spring to autumn. Climbing is particularly nice in summer as the crag is in the shade throughout the day. You can climb here while it's raining, although some routes remain wet after heavy rain and the Upper Sector (Zgornji sektor) usually dries in two days. This sector gets plenty of sun during winter
the dense forest provides a welcome relief from the summer heat and the whole sector is in the shade after 13:00 during the hottest days of the year.
description.sl:
Za gostim drevjem v neposredni bližini ceste, ki se ob Soči vije iz Nove Gorice proti Bovcu, se skriva nizka lepo razčlenjena stena z dobro skalo. Zadnja pridobitev plezališča je Zgornji sektor s strmim dostopom, kjer je možno plezati vse leto.

Od zgodnje pomladi do jeseni. Zaradi sence je plezanje prijetno predvsem poleti. Možno je plezati tudi v dežju, a so po obilnejšem deževju nekatere smeri mokre
Zgornji sektor se posuši v dveh dneh. Ta je pozimi izpostavljen soncu, poleti pa vročino lajšata gozd in lega stene, ki omogoča plezanje v senci po 13. uri.

routes.name: To je to za ta denar

description.en:
The steep and overhanging faces above the Bela Creek are excellently equipped and therefore very popular. The rock is first-class, but some of the routes are a bit polished and the grades are quite stiff. Most of the easier routes are to be found in the D sector, the C sector has longer, stamina-based routes, and the sectors A and E hold the most difficult routes of the crag. The E sector has somewhat widely spaced bolts and is less popular as a result.

From spring to autumn. In the summer it is better to climb in the afternoon. After prolonged rain the crags remain wet for a long time
.
description.sl:
Nad potokom Bela se dvigajo strme in previsne stene odlično urejenega in posledično zelo obiskanega plezališča. Skala je prvovrstna, nekatere najbolj plezane smeri so že malce zlizane, ocene pa ponekod navite. Največ lažjih smeri je v steni Pod travnikom (D), daljše vzdržljvostne smeri so v sektorju C (Stolp), najtežje pa na obeh koncih kanjona, v sektorjih A in E. Slednji je slabše opremljen in zato tudi manj obiskan.

Od pomladi do jeseni. Poleti je bolje plezati popoldne, ko je večina sten v senci. Po daljšem deževju so nekatere smeri mokre.

description.en:
It is an ideal summer crag, as it lies in a shady narrow gorge.
If there is water running through the bed of a torrent, the upper, highest sector can't be reached through the gorge. In this case the approach from the upper side is recommended.
Summer or warm spring and autumn. In spite of the overhanging wall, the crag gets wet when it is raining and it dries slowly.
The entire territory of the crag is on private land. Please consider this while parking, approaching or climbing.
description.sl:
Plezališče leži v ozki soteski in je zaradi svoje senčnosti idealno poletno plezališče.

Ko v strugi hudournika teče voda, je prehod po soteski v zgornji, najvišji sektor nemogoč. Takrat je priporočljiv dostop z zgornje strani.
Poletje in topla pomlad ali jesen. Kljub previsnosti dež stene dobro namoči, zato se počasi sušijo.
Področje plezališča leži na privatni zemlji, zato je vsestranska obzirnost obvezna, tako pri parkiranju kot med dostopom in plezanjem.

description.en:
An excellently equipped crag near the town of Hrastnik. The climbers worked together with the local authorities to clean the crag and its surroundings.

Spring and autumn. The crag gets a little bit of sunshine during winter, and the summers are usually too hot for climbing. Best time for climbing is before 11:00 or after 16:00.
Development of this crag is very difficult and time-consuming as the face requires a lot of cleaning, so please avoid climbing on the right part of the crag if there's work going on.
The parking space under the crag is for people bolting and cleaning the routes, so please don't park there. You can use the parking space at the crossroads at the monument, from where it's a short walk to the crag.
We recommend that you use a helmet (at least while belaying) in the left part of the crag, as there's a loose slope above the face.
description.sl:
Odlično urejeno plezališče pri Hrastniku so iz zapuščenega in zanemarjenega sveta uredili lokalni plezalci v sodelovanju z občino. Trenutno je opremljen le levi sektor, v desnem, večjem delu pa smeri še nastajajo.

Pomlad in jesen. Steno za kratek čas doseže sonce tudi pozimi, poleti pa je praviloma prevroče. Plezati se da dopoldne do 11. ali popoldne po 16.
Delo je zaradi stene, ki zahteva veliko čiščenja, zahtevno in zamudno, zato plezanje v nedokončenem desnem delu v času, ko tam delajo opremljevalci, ni možno.
Parkirišče pod steno je namenjeno opremljevalcem smeri. Za vse ostale je parkirišče na križišču pri spomeniku, od koder je do pod stene le nekaj minut.
V levem delu je vsaj za varujočega priporočljiva čelada, saj se nad steno nadaljuje pobočje.

description.en:
The small face above the parking lot at the beginning of the forest learning path is visited mainly by local climbers.

From spring to autumn.
The three hardest routes have loose rock.
description.sl:
Pod kalvarijo je majhno plezališče tik nad parkiriščem ob začetku gozdne učne poti, ki ga obiskujejo predvsem lokalni plezalci.

Od pomladi do jeseni.
Tri najtežje smeri so krušljive.

description.en:
The crag lies in the forest to the north of Jesenice. This small, pleasant, and well equipped wall used to be an important training place for generations of local alpinists.


From late spring to early autumn.
description.sl:
Plezališče je skrito v gozdu na severni strani Jesenic. Je majhno, prijetno, soli-dno urejeno in zgodovinsko pomembno, saj so tu trenirale vse povojne genera-cije jeseniških alpinistov.

Od pozne pomladi do zgodnje jeseni.

description.en:
The large boulder Sivnica lies in the middle of the forest at the foot of the south west slopes of the Brana (the Kamnik Alps), not far from the trail towards the saddle Kokrsko sedlo. At present there are only four routes on the face above the cableway. In the neighbourhood, there is great potential for bouldering.


From May to October.
Park neatly at the turning for the Jermanca without blocking the road.
description.sl:
Pod jugozahodnim pobočjem Brane, nedaleč od poti na Kokrsko sedlo, se sredi gozda skriva velik balvan Sivnica. V steni nad tovorno žičnico pa so zaenkrat opremljene le štiri smeri. V okolici je velik potencial za balvansko plezanje.


Od maja do oktobra.
Ob odcepu za Jermanco parkirajte tako, da ne boste ovirali prometa.

description.en:
Amidst the idyllic surroundings above the walkway alongside the Kamniška Bistrica River an old crag previously used by climbers of Domžale has been re-equipped with resin bolts. Watch out for loose rock in some routes!


Summer.
description.sl:
V idiličnem okolju je bil tik nad sprehajalno stezo ob Kamniški Bistrici z lepljenimi klini opremljen nekdanji domžalski plezalni vrtec. Nekatere smeri so krušljive, zato previdno.

Poletni meseci.

description.en:
The routes are excellently bolted and the base of the crag is wonderfully maintained. The routes are shorter and easier and require good footwork, as well as strong fingers.

In summer in the morning.
description.sl:
Plezališče je vzorno urejeno in opremljeno. Smeri so krajše in lažje s poudarkom na gibanju in moči prstov.

Poleti dopoldne.

description.en:
The routes cross a well-featured white wall. You are recommended to wear a helmet, as the rock is still a bit loose in some places.
The small, picturesque and well-equipped crag lies directly below the ossuary at the bypass towards Bovec, just a stone's throw from the centre of Kobarid.

All the year round, also on sunny winter days.
description.sl:
Smeri potekajo po dobro razčlenjeni beli skali. Smeri so mestoma še neočiščene, zato čelada ne bo odveč.
Majhno, slikovito in lepo urejeno plezališče leži točno pod Kobariško kostnico ob bovški obvoznici streljaj od centra mesta.

Preko celega leta, tudi v toplih zimskih dneh.

description.en:
This crag, which is very close to Kotečnik, is located just below the top of a hill. The access path goes up in a gentle arc and you should take the left-hand option in all of the intersections, making sure to stay on the main path.
The crag has been very well equipped with resin bolts.


Summer and autumn in the morning.
description.sl:
Plezališče v bližini Kotečnika leži tik pod vrhom hriba. Dostop do njega vodi v polkrožnem vzponu, na številnih odcepih se držimo leve oziroma glavne steze. Plezališče je odlično opremljeno z lepljenimi klini.

Poleti in jeseni dopoldne.

description.en:
The crags in the Bukovska grapa Gorge above the Idrijca River are easy to reach, but visible only from the foot of the wall.
New sectors above the bridge across the Kozarska grapa have recently been developed at this excellent summer crag. Two new sectors have been opened (N and O) at the time of writing.


From early spring to late autumn. In summer, several routes are in the shade. After heavy rainfall it is possible to climb especially on the towers C and H. But in humid weather in the summer, the walls can be damp.
description.sl:
Plezališče v Bukovski grapi nad Idrijco je lahko dostopno, vendar ga zagledamo šele, ko se spustimo do njega.
Zadnja pridobitev tega odličnega poletnega plezališča so novi sektorji nad mostom čez Kozarsko grapo. Zaenkrat sta opremljena dva (N in O).


Od zgodnje pomladi do pozne jeseni. Poleti je precej smeri v senci. Po močnejšem dežju se še najhitreje posušita sektorja C in H. V soparnih poletnih dneh so lahko stene vlažne zaradi kondenza.

routes.name: Pa crklajnsku mu zave ta prous

description.en:
In the nice climbing area in the middle of idyllic surroundings easier routes prevail.
The crags have regulated toilets.
Summer. After rain the rock dries slowly.
Please close the gates!
description.sl:
V prijetnem plezališču sredi idiličnega okolja prevladujejo lažje smeri.
Plezališče ima urejene sanitarije.
Poletje. Po dežju se skala počasi suši.
Obvezno zapiraj lese!

description.en:
The small crag lies besides the Škofja Loka-Podbrdo road in the valley Selška dolina. Many easy routes have been recently equipped.

From late spring to early autumn. In summer it is too hot to climb during the day
but after 4 p.m. the crag is in the shade.
description.sl:
Majhno plezališče leži tik ob cesti Škofja Loka-Podbrdo v Selški dolini. V zadnjem času je bilo opremljenih precej lažjih smeri.

Pozna pomlad, poletje in zgodnja jesen. Poleti je sredi dneva vroče, senca pa od 16. ure dalje.

description.en:
The steep walls rising above the village of Dovje have great single and multi-pitch routes and offer wonderful views of the Vrata Valley. The original name of this rock formation is Granšica, but the name Blažčeva skala is more common among climbers. The grades are stiff and the routes are exposed and suitable for experienced climbers.


Spring, autumn and on dry sunny days in winter. It can be very hot in summer. The wall dries quickly, even after heavy rain.
Watch out for snakes (vipers) at the foot of the crag in the summer. The rock quality varies from excellent to loose so it is recommended to wear a helmet. Extra care and attention are needed when climbing routes with old bolts.
description.sl:
Nad Dovjem se dvigajo strme stene, ki ponujajo zlasti eno- in večraztežajne smeri ter prekrasen pogled na dolino Vrata. Pravilno ledinsko ime celotnega ostenja je Granšica, med plezalci pa se je uveljavilo ime Blažčeva skala. Ta sicer leži ob vznožju ostenja, v desnem delu pa je tudi vhod v Blažčevo jamo. Ocene so 'navite', smeri pa izpostavljene in primerne za izkušenejše plezalce.


Spomladi in jeseni ter ob suhih in sonč-nih dnevih pozimi. Poleti je lahko precej vroče. Skala se po obilnem deževju hitro suši.
Pod steno nas poleti lahko presenetijo modrasi.
Kakovost skale niha od odlične do slabše, zato je priporočljiva uporaba čelade. V smereh s starimi svedrovci pa je potrebna previdnost.

routes.name: Primi z roko, misli z glavo

description.en:
The crag is situated in a large sinkhole near Divača. It has been re-equipped recently with glue-in bolts and anchors and is truly well worth a visit. It lies in beautiful Karst surroundings and the climbing is mostly vertical and slabby, favouring precise footwork over raw strength. The grades are quite stiff.

Late autumn to early spring. The crags' sheltered position allows climbing when the strong north wind blows.
It is recommended to wear a helmet (especially for the belayer), as the rock on some of the routes is still a bit loose. There's a fixed rope in place for the approach to the furthest left sector
make sure to check it before using it and consider the other approach option (abseiling from the top). The base of this part of the crag is very exposed.
description.sl:
Plezališče v veliki kraški udornici pri Divači je zaradi gosto poraščenega roba težko opazno. Smeri so preopremljene z lepljenimi klini in sidrišči, tako da je plezališče zares vredno obiska. Odlikuje ga čudovit kraški ambient in smeri, pri katerih pride do izraza predvsem dobra tehnika plezanja v navpičnih ploščah. Za ocene se je treba kar potruditi.

Od pozne jeseni do zgodnje pomladi. Zavetrna lega omogoča plezanje tudi ob hudi kraški burji.
V nekaterih smereh je skala še rahlo krušljiva, zato je priporočljiva čelada, predvsem za varovalca.Pod skrajno levi sektor Risnika vodi fiksirana vrv, katere kvaliteto je dobro preveriti, dostop pa je možen tudi s spustom z vrha. Vznožje smeri je tu izpostavljeno.

description.en:
The mountainous region to the east of Kamnik is covered with woods. Near the village of Vranja Peč, a rocky tower stands out as an isolated spire, offering very good rock and a wonderful view of the Ljubljana basin. Plus, you could belay practically from your car.

Spring and autumn, it is usually too hot in summer.
description.sl:
Hriboviti svet vzhodno od Kamnika v glavnem prekrivajo gozdovi, zato skalnati stolp ob vasi Vranja Peč izgleda kot osamelec. Lep razgled na Ljubljansko kotlino, odlična skala in parkirišče praktično pod steno.

Spomladi in jeseni. Poleti je lahko preko dneva prevroče.

description.en:
The face behind the village - Banje (A) requires much stamina and determina-tion to complete the climbs. The Babna wall (B) offers very pleasant face clim-bing on vertical to slightly overhanging walls with sharp positive holds, with the exception of the left part of the wall that also requires stamina and determi-nation on the overhangs. Some of the Big Wall routes are very overhanging and require much stamina. All routes are very well equipped.
The picturesque village of Osp at the foot of the Karst edge is one of the oldest villages in Slovenia. At the end of the 70s, the first climbers appeared at Osp attracted by the vertical and overhanging walls of the densely vegetated amphitheatre. The unique surroundings, the mild climate, the inviting proximity of the sea, the excellent rock and the routes of all grades have made this climbing area famous both at home and all over the world.
Accommodation
Campsite Pri Vovku in Osp and several hostels, B&Bs, and other accommodation options in and around Osp.
The best time to go is undoubtedly in spring, autumn and during periods of warm and windless winter weather. It is usually too hot in mid-summer.
Please use the parking area beneath Mišja peč, payable with EasyPark's App.
5 €/day, 10 €/3 days, 15 €/7 days
description.sl:
V steni za vasjo - sektor Banje (A) prevladujejo previsne smeri in skoraj za vse je značilno vzdržljivostno plezanje. Stena nad Babno (B) nudi povsem drug tip plezanja: navpične do rahlo previ-sne plošče z dobrimi in ponekod ostrimi oprimki, z izjemo levega dela stene, kjer sta v previsih prav tako potrebni moč in vzdržljivost. Smeri v Veliki steni poleg precizne tehnike večinoma zahtevajo tudi moč in vzdržljivost, saj so nekatere med njimi pošteno previsne. Vse smeri so odlično opremljene.

Ob vznožju Kraškega roba leži ena najstarejših vasi na Slovenskem. Strme stene nad bujnim rastjem amfiteatra, ki so tako značilno zaznamovale podobo Ospa, so že konec sedemdesetih let pritegnile pozornost prvih plezalcev. Enkratno okolje z milim podnebjem in vabljivo bližino morja, odlična skala in smeri vseh težavnosti pa so pripomogli k slovesu osapskih sten doma in v svetu.
Prenočišče
Kamp Pri Vovku v Ospu ter številne prenočitvene možnosti v kraju in okoliških vaseh.
Najlepše je brez dvoma spomladi in jeseni ter ob toplih zimskih dneh brez vetra. Sredi poletja je zaradi prisojne lege sten večinoma prevroče.
Parkirišče pod Mišjo pečjo. Plačljivo z aplikacijoEasypark.si.
5 €/dan, 10 €/3 dni, 15 €/7 dni

routes.name: Try just a little bit harder
Bereit, wenn sie es sind dr. Lecter

description.en:
A popular crag in a narrow valley beneath Zaplata. Most of the routes are moderately difficult, making Preddvor a sensible choice for beginners. Some of the slabby routes have pretty stiff grades and require strong fingers and good climbing technique.
Climbing Restrictions
An owl usually nests on the face and during the period of nesting climbing is banned on the route Sova and on the two routes to the right and left of it. Pay attention to the warnings by local climbers.
Late spring, summer and autumn.
Park at the turning for a shooting range, immediately after the asphalt finishes.
description.sl:
Dobro obiskano plezališče je stisnjeno v ozki dolini pod Zaplato. Prevladujejo smeri zmernih težav, zato je Preddvor primeren tudi za začetnike. Smeri v ploščah z občasno konkretnimi ocenami zahtevajo poleg močnih prstov tudi dobro tehniko plezanja.

Pozna pomlad, poletje in jesen.

Prepovedi: Ob gnezdenju je prepovedano plezanje smeri Sova ter smeri levo in desno od nje.
Parkirajte na odcepu za strelišče, takoj ko se konča asfalt.

description.en:
The crags are hidden in the forest at the west side of the Kamnik. In spite of its extensiveness the crag has a local character. The whole climbing area has been recently re-equipped.
Above the farm Baloh it is possible to take water out of the well.
From early spring to late autumn.
Climbers are asked to park on the saddle (the meeting of a few roads and the beginning of the signposts) and not at the farm Baloh.
description.sl:
Plezališče je skrito v gozdu na zahodni strani Kamnika. Kljub svoji obsežnosti je lokalnega značaja. Plezališče je bilo v celoti preopremljeno z lepljenimi klini.
Nad kmetijo Baloh si lahko natočite vodo, ki skoraj vedno teče iz zajetja.
Od zgodnje pomladi do pozne jeseni.
Parkirajte obvezno na sedlu (križišče več cest in začetek markacij) in ne pri kmetiji Baloh.

description.en:
In the valley of the River Topla, at the foothills of Peca stretches a large wall from 50 to 90 m high. Smooth vertical slabs of Burjakove peči are interrupted by numerous overhangs. Marked boulders are scattered in the nearby woods. The grades of some older routes up to 6c are still underestimated, but above 7a are quite realistic.
For the climbers from the western part of Slovenia it is quicker to reach the valley by crossing the Austro-Slovenian border at Bleiberg and continue to Črna.
Spring and autumn
in the summer in the afternoon.
Park at the regulated parking place.
description.sl:
V dolini Tople pod Peco na Koroškem je skrita široka, 50 do 90 metrov visoka stena. Navpične gladke plošče Burjakovih peči so prekinjene s številnimi previsi. V bližnjem gozdu so označeni balvani. Ocene nekaterih starejših smeri do 6c so še vedno navite, nad 7a pa dokaj realne.
Za vse plezalce, ki prihajajo iz zahodne polovice Slovenije, je najkrajša pot preko mejnega prehoda Jezersko in na avstrijski strani mimo Pliberka nazaj v Slovenijo ter naprej do Črne na Koroškem.
Pomlad in jesen
poleti popoldne.
Parkirajte na urejenem parkirišču.

description.en:
A smaller crag before the parking place at the bottom station of the Krvavec cable car. Although the routes are quite easy, the often loose rock and old bolts add to the seriousness of climbing.

Spring to autumn.
You are recommended to wear a helmet, especially in the right part of the wall where the rock is still a bit loose.
description.sl:
Manjše plezališče leži tik pred parkiriš-čem spodnje postaje žičnice na Krvavec. Ne glede na to da so smeri lažje, ima plezarija tudi zaradi mestoma krušljive skale in starejših svedrovcev 'hribovski karakter'.

Pomlad, poletje, jesen.
Ker je zlasti v desnem delu stene skala še rahlo krušljiva, je vsaj za varujočega priporočljiva čelada.

description.en:
In the immediate vicinity of the Bohinj Lake a 40 m wall rises above the entertainment area of Pod Skalco. In the summer season and during weekends you must be able to cope with an audience of onlookers. The vertical to slightly overhanging face is particularly suitable for climbers of higher grades, although there are quite a few easier routes on the lower right-hand section of the face. The most popular shorter routes are polished and the longer ones, which aren't climbed as much, are dusty.



From late spring to early autumn
in the summer, the wall comes into shade after 12 o'clock.
Car parks at the crag and in front of Hotel Jezero are fee-paying.
description.sl:
V neposredni bližini Bohinjskega jezera je plezalcem na voljo 40 metrov visoka stena nad prireditvenim prostorom Pod Skalco, zato se v poletni sezoni med vikendi plezanje lahko sprevrže v predstavo za množico turistov in obiskovalcev. Navpična do rahlo previsna stena privablja predvsem zahtevnejše plezalce, čeprav je v nižjem desnem delu opremljenih precej lažjih smeri. Najbolj oblegane krajše smeri so zlizane, daljše, ki so manj plezane, pa prašne.

Od pozne pomladi do zgodnje jeseni
poleti je stena v senci po 12 h.
Parkirišči ob steni in pred hotelom Jezero sta plačljivi.

description.en:
A varied and relatively high face in the picturesque gorge of Strug offers many interesting routes for climbers searching not only for extreme grades. Under the roofs that bulge above the face, the rock is always a bit dusty, as the rain does not keep the rock clean.

From spring to autumn. In mid-summer it is usually too hot and it's better to climb in the morning or late in the afternoon. After rain the rock remains wet for a long time. There's a natural bathing area (called Lajšt) at the confluence of rivers Belca and Idrijca, just over a kilometre from the crag.
description.sl:
Razgibana in razmeroma visoka stena v slikoviti soteski Strug ponuja precej zanimivih smeri za plezalce, ki ne iščejo le skrajnih težav. Ocene so rahlo navite. Pod previsi je skala vedno nekoliko prašna, saj jo le poredkoma spere dež.

Od pomladi do jeseni. Po dežju skala ostane dolgo mokra. Sredi poletja je lahko zelo vroče, zato je takrat najbolje plezati zjutraj ali pozno popoldne. Le dober kilometer naprej je na sotočju Idrijce in Belce naravno kopališče Lajšt.

routes.name: Žgala sva se na vročem soncu

description.en:
A crag lies amongst the woods at the foot of Rudnica. Easier and well protected routes, suitable for beginners, prevail. On the vertical and slightly overhanging slabs the rock might be loose and dusty at some places.

Spring to autumn. The west face is in the shade till 11 a.m. in the summer and the east face after 11 a.m. After a longer period of rain the face needs at least one or two days to dry.
Park at the Dov parking space, which is 2,3 km further along the cycling path. Bikes are generally the best option in Bohinj.
description.sl:
Plezališče leži v gozdu ob vznožju masiva Rudnice. Prevladujejo lažje dobro zavarovane smeri. V navpičnih in rahlo previsnih ploščah je skala ponekod še rahlo krušljiva in prašna.

Od pomladi do jeseni. Poleti je v zahodni steni senca do 11 h, v vzhodni pa po 11 h. Stena se po daljšem deževju suši dan ali dva.
Parkiramo na parkirišču za Dov, do katerega je 800 m po kolesarski stezi (2,3 km do P). Na splošno velja, da je v Bohinju kolo najprimernejše prevozno sredstvo.

description.en:
Hidden in the forest above the village of Liboje in the east of Slovenia, is the best Slovenian summer climbing area. Kotečnik offers diverse climbing, excellent rock and big potential for new routes. All the accesses to the rocks are across private land, so consider the warnings.
For the sectors A and B to G the access from the farmhouse Tratnik - P1 recommended. For the sectors J, K and L the approach from the parking place P2 at the quarry is half shorter. The approach to the sector I - Kača takes a good half an hour walk from both parking places while the descent to the P2 at the quarry is much shorter - 15 min.
Accommodation
A campsite at the farmhouse Tratnik
From spring to autumn.
The parking place and the approaches to the crags have been regulated in order to avoid crossing the yard of the farm under the wall. It is forbidden to use the private road to the farm and park at the turning of the road.
P1 - Leave the cars at the big parking place of the farmhouse Tratnik.
P2 - When approaching from the quarry park at the beginning of the path or about 100 m further at the left turn. Respect all the warning signs!
description.sl:
V gozdovih nad Libojami se skriva najboljše slovensko poletno plezališče. Kotečnik nudi pestro izbiro solidno opremljenih smeri, odlično skalo in velik potencial za nove smeri. Vsi dostopi potekajo čez privatna zemljišča, zato obvezno upoštevajte vsa opozorila.
Za sektorje A in B do G je priporočljiv dostop od kmetije Tratnik - P1. Za sektorje J, K in L je dostop s parkirišča P2 pri kamnolomu za polovico krajši. Do sektorja I - Kača je dobrih 30 min hoje z obeh parkirišč, sestop na parkirišče P2 pa precej krajši - 15 min.

Prenočišče
Kamp kmetije Tratnik
Od pomladi do jeseni.
Parkirišče in dostopi do plezališča so urejeni in označeni tako, da ne potekajo več čez dvorišče kmetije pod steno. Prav tako je prepovedana vožnja po privatni cesti, ki vodi proti kmetiji, in parkiranje na samem odcepu le-te.
P1 - Avtomobile parkirajte obvezno na velikem parkirišču kmetije Tratnik.
P2 - Pri dostopu od kamnoloma parkirajte na samem začetku poti ali približno 100 m dalje ob cesti pri odcepu levo. Upoštevajte vse opozorilne table!

description.en:
The local alpinists from the village of Gorje were the first to climb here, on the slabby lower sector right next to the road. The upper sector has mostly short but very intense routes on slightly overhanging terrain. Due to the nice surroundings and routes of all difficulties, the crag is perfect for a summertime family visit.


From spring to autumn. The Gorje wall is in the shade in the mornings, and the right part of the Zatrata wall comes into shade after 12 o'clock (the rest of the wall is in the shade throughout the day).
The Zatrata sector is shared with cavers, who use it as a training ground
please stay out of their way during their courses. Make sure to park your car so that you're not in the way of traffic and forestry workers. Take away your trash.
description.sl:
Alpinisti iz Gorij so začeli plezati v prijetnem 'platastem' spodnjem sektorju, ki se nahaja tik ob cesti. Zgornji sektor, 'Zadnja skala', kot ji pravijo domačini, ponuja večinoma kratko, vendar zelo intenzivno pleza-nje v večinoma rahlo previsnih smereh. Plezališče je primerno za poletno družinsko plezanje, saj poleg prijetnega ambienta skala omogoča smeri vseh težavnosti.

Pomladi do jeseni. V Gorjah je stena v senci dopoldne, na Zatrati pa je desni del stene na soncu do 12. ure, ostali del pa ves čas v senci.
Sektor Zatrata služi tudi kot jamarski poligon
ko potekajo vaje, imajo jamarji prednost. Parkirajte tako, da ne ovirate prometa in gozdarskih del. Smeti odnašajte s seboj.

description.en:
Čreta is, without a shadow of a doubt, one of the best Slovenian crags. Excellent rock and countless well-bolted routes of all grades cater to both beginners and experts. The crag is in the forest quite high up in the hills, making it a great choice for climbing in the heat of the summer.
Accommodation
Mountain hut Planinski dom na Čreti, 966 m, 15 min from the climbing area. Camp Podgrad Vransko.
From March to November
in sunny winters without snow, it is possible to climb in some sectors, looking southwards. Thanks to the shade of the forest and the altitude, it is possible to climb all day long in summer.
Don't park after the No Traffic sign! By doing so your car would be in the way of forestry workers. If the parking area is full, please park at the church (the approach will take just a few minutes longer).
description.sl:
Čreta je eno boljših in bolje opremljenih plezališč v Sloveniji. Odlična skala in veliko odlično opremljenih smeri vseh težavnosti nudi izziv tako začetnikom kot tudi najboljšim plezalcem.

Prenočišča
Planinski dom na Čreti, 966 m, od koder je do plezališča 15 minut hoje. Kamp Podgrad Vransko.
Od marca do novembra, v sončnih zimah brez snega pa v nekaterih sektorjih, ki gledajo na jug. Poleti je zaradi gozda in velike nadmorske višine možno plezati ves dan. Prijeten ambient v gozdu in dokaj visoka nadmorska višina pa poskrbita, da je plezališče ena boljših izbir za plezanje v poletnem času.
Ne parkirajte za tablo, ki označuje prepoved prometa! S tem zapirate poti, ki služijo spravilu lesa! Če je parkirišče polno, parkirajte pri cerkvi, kar dostop podaljša za par minut.

description.en:
A small crag on the slopes of Rudnica with good rock and nice routes. The approach is quite steep and long and the base of the crag is not very comfortable
as a result, the crag doesn't see much traffic. It has been re-equipped with glue-in bolts.
The approach path follows the trail to Rudnica via Široka polica.
From February to November. It is possible to climb also in winter. It is usually too hot in summer.
description.sl:
Stena leži ob markirani poti. Od parkirišča sledimo oznakam za Rudnico in na razpotju zavijemo levo na pot, ki vodi na vrh Rudnice čez Široko polico. Plezališče je preopremljeno z lepljenimi klini.

Od februarja do novembra. Plezanje je možno tudi pozimi. Poleti je ponavadi prevroče.

description.en:
Varied, moderately difficult routes that make for pleasant climbing without any crowds. The approach can be shortened with a bike as the crag is located right next to a bike path. The nearby Sava River is perfect for a refreshing dip in the hot summer months. The approach to sector B is not the most straightforward.

From spring to autumn. Stick to early mornings and late afternoons if you want to climb during the summer.
There's free parking just after the bridge next to the bike path in Savica
parking is paid everywhere else.Keep an eye out for snakes in the summer months. You'll belay practically from the bike path, so take due care.
description.sl:
Razgibane smeri zmernih težavnosti nudijo prijetno plezanje v manj oble-ganem plezališču. Daljši dostop je pametno "skrajšati" s kolesom, saj se plezališče nahaja ob kolesarski stezi. Bližina reke Save nudi prijetno osvežitev v vročih poletnih dneh. Sektor B je težje dostopen.

Od pomladi do jeseni. V vročih pole-tnih dneh le zgodaj zjutraj ali pozno popoldan.
V Savici je za mostom ob kolesarski stezi urejeno brezplačno parkirišče
ostala so plačljiva!V toplejših mesecih lahko naletimo na kače. Varujemo praktično na kolesarski stezi, zato previdno.

description.en:
The majority of the routes cross verti-cal walls on good rock providing very aesthetic climbing. The crag offers a large variety of routes including many of easier grades, which makes it perfect for beginners.
The sunny walls of the Karst edge, which stretch from above the village of Črni Kal far into the Istrian Peninsula, have been vital to the development of Slovenian free climbing. Nowadays Črni Kal is a modern and well equipped climbing area in a pleasant sheltered position, with comfortable flat ground at the foot of the crags, nice surroundings and the wide view of the Gulf of Trieste and the rolling hillside of the Slovenian Istria.
Accommodation
Campsite Pri Vovku in Osp and several hostels, B&Bs, and other accommoda-tion options in and around Črni Kal.
The best time to go is from autumn to spring. It is usually too hot in the summer, except on the north side of the Turški stolp (B).
The routes in the left and central parts of the crag have slightly stiffer grades than Osp. On the right part of the crag (Peskovnik sector), the rock can be loose, so it's a good idea for the belayer to wear a helmet. The most popular routes are quite polished.
description.sl:
Večina smeri poteka po navpičnih in dobro razčlenjenih ploščah. Skala je izredno dobra in omogoča zelo estetsko plezanje. Zaradi velikega števila lažjih in srednje težkih smeri je plezališče primerno tudi za začetnike.

V prisojnih stenah Kraškega roba, ki se iznad Črnega Kala vlečejo daleč v notranjost Istre, se je pisala zgodovina prostega plezanja v Sloveniji. Danes je to moderno opremljeno plezališče z ugodno zavetrno lego, udobnim ravnim svetom ob vznožju sten, prijetnim okoljem in širnim pogledom na Šavrinsko gričevje in Tržaški zaliv.

Prenočišče
Kamp Pri Vovku v Ospu ter številne prenočitvene možnosti v kraju in okoliš-kih vaseh.
Najlepše je spomladi, jeseni in v toplih zimskih dneh. Poleti je ponavadi prevroče, razen na severni strani Turškega stolpa.

V levem in osrednjem delu plezališča so ocene za odtenek nižje kot v Ospu. V desnem delu, v Peskovniku, je skala mestoma krušljiva, zato je čelada vsaj za varujočega zelo priporočljiva.

routes.name: Koko bom vrtal, če nimam niti za vijake

description.en:
The climbing area lies within beautiful beech forest nearly 600 m high above the Trebuša valley. The walls rise above the picturesque and exposed macadam road that connects Dolenja Trebuša and Čepovanski dol.
The road Dolenja Trebuša-Čepovan is officially open between 1 March and 1 November.
A typical summer crag. It is also possible to climb on warm days from the beginning of April to the end of October.
description.sl:
Plezališče leži v lepem bukovem gozdu skoraj 600 metrov visoko nad dolino Trebuše. Nahaja se tik ob slikoviti in izpostavljeni makadamski cesti, ki povezuje Dolenjo Trebušo s Čepovanskim dolom.
Cesta Dolenja Trebuša-Čepovan je uradno odprta od 1. 3. do 1. 11.
Tipično poletno plezališče. V toplih dneh je možno plezati od začetka aprila do konca oktobra.

description.en:
The climbing area V Kotu or Vranske peči lies at the slopes of Uršlja gora and is one of the newest crags in the region. It is a typical summer crag, distinguished by well protected easier routes with solid limestone. At the foot of the wall there are some 10 marked boulder problems between the routes Klic divjine and Darjin sendvič.

From spring to autumn. The crag is a good choice for hot summer days due to its altitude. In the summer, the sun reaches the wall in the morning, later in the day it remains in a pleasant shade. After rain the wall dries quickly.

Heavier rains may damage the macadam road, which leads to the wall. Otherwise, the road is always passable.
description.sl:
Plezališče V Kotu ali tudi Vranske peči leži na obronkih Uršlje gore in sodi med novejša koroška plezališča. Gre za tipično poletno plezališče, ki ga odlikujejo dobro zavarovane lažje smeri v čvrstem apnencu. V vznožju stene je splezanih in označenih tudi okoli 10 balvanskih problemov, ki se nahajajo med smermi Klic narave in Darjin sendvič.

Od pomladi do jeseni. Zaradi precejšnje nadmorske višine je plezališče dobra izbira za vroče poletne dni. Poleti je stena v soncu le dopoldne, potem pa je ves čas v prijetni senci. Po dežju se stena hitro posuši.
Močnejše deževje lahko poškoduje makadam, ki pripelje do pod stene. Cesta je sicer vedno prevozna.

description.en:
A typical summertime crag with sharp rock and a short approach. The routes are long and stamina based up over-hangs with good handholds. A great option for good climbers. There's a freshwater spring at the base.

Summer. The crag is surrounded by forest and it's in the shade in the afternoon.
description.sl:
Tipično poletno plezališče z ostro skalo odlikujejo kratek dostop in dolge, vzdržljivostne smeri v previsu z dobrimi oprimki. Prava izbira za dobre plezalce. Pod steno je izvir pitne vode.

Poletje. Steno obdaja gozd in je popol-dne v senci.

description.en:
The crag is situated on the main road between Idrija and Tolmin. The lower part of the wall is slightly overhanging, with the routes following slabs and cracks.

From spring to autumn, but it is usually too hot in mid-summer. After heavy rain the rock dries in a day or two.
description.sl:
Plezališče leži tik ob magistralni cesti Idrija-Tolmin. Spodnji del stene je rahlo previsen, sicer pa smeri potekajo čez plošče in poči.

Od pomladi do jeseni, vendar je poleti sredi dneva pogosto vroče. Po obilnejšem deževju se skala suši dan ali dva.

description.en:
The numerous faces and towers found on the south west slopes of Šmarna gora, close to Ljubljana, used to be important for training for the more difficult climbs in the mountains. With the development of free climbing they have lost this role but still provide entertainment for the novice climber.

All year round and during dry winters. In the summer months it is usually too hot during the day.
In front of the inn Kovač there is a parking place for 4 cars.
description.sl:
Jugozahodno pobočje Šmarne gore v bližini Ljubljane je posejano s številnimi stenami in skalnimi stolpi, ki so zlasti nekoč služili številnim alpinistom kot trening za vzpone v gorah. Z razvojem plezalnega športa so to vlogo izgubili, še vedno pa so zelo primerni za alpinistične oziroma plezalne šole.

Vse leto, tudi ob suhih in toplih zimah. Poleti je preko dneva prevroče.
Nasproti gostilne Kovač so ob cesti 4 parkirna mesta. Najbolje bo, da se o možnosti parkiranja prepričate na licu mesta.

description.en:
A pleasant and nicely equipped crag with great rock and delicate slab climbing. Some of the easier routes are a bit polished and the grades are quite stiff (as they are in most local crags).

All year round
on sunny days in winter. The A sector is usually too hot in the summer.
description.sl:
Prijetno in lepo urejeno plezališče odlikuje odlična skala in natančno plezanje v plateh. Lažje smeri so ponekod zlizane, ocene pa, kot se za lokalno plezališče 'spodobi', navite.

Preko celega leta
pozimi predvsem ob sončnih dneh. V sektorju A je poleti ponavadi prevroče.

description.en:
A popular crag between Dovje and Blažčeva skala, notable for its sunny position and beautiful, mostly easier routes with hood handholds.
About a third of the anchors on top of the routes have carabiners for trouble-free lowering
the other anchors will need to be threaded. The rock is very featured and somewhat loose, so keep an eye out for holds that might snap.
From early spring to late autumn. Thanks to the forest, the crags lie in shade in the summer, but it is also possible to climb during sunny winter days after 10 a.m.
description.sl:
Priljubljeno in dobro obiskano plezališče leži med Dovjem in Blažčevo skalo. Odlikujejo ga sončna lega in lepe, predvsem lažje smeri z dobrimi oprimki.
Dobra tretjina smeri je opremljenih z vponkami za spust, pri ostalih je potrebno prevezovanje. Skala je mestoma precej razčlenjena in razbita, zato se lahko še kje kaj odlomi.
Od zgodnje pomladi do pozne jeseni
v poletni vročini za senco poskrbi gozd. Plezati je možno tudi pozimi ob suhih sončnih dneh po 10 h.

description.en:
Rock with many grooves, sharp holds and slabs of excellent light-coloured limestone.
The first alpine climbing area in the Bovec basin offers a good number of routes on excellent rock, which at present are mostly easy. By using the cableway, which takes you to an elevation of 2200 m in only half an hour, you are able to escape quickly from the summer heat in the valley.
In an alpine region the weather can be changeable. It is therefore recommendable to take warm clothing, suncream and sunglasses. There is no water available at the crag. The approaches to the walls are marked by cairns, blue arrows and signs VPPK. In the sectors Frenč, Trebuh, Vrtec and Skalarjeva plošča, a helmet is recommendable.
Late spring, summer and autumn. The rock dries quickly.
description.sl:
Pakleniška skala s številnimi žlebiči, ostrimi oprimki in platmi v odličnem belem apnencu.
Prvo visokogorsko plezališče na Bovškem ponuja soliden izbor trenutno predvsem lažjih smeri v odlični skali. Dostop s kabinsko žičnico, ki nas v dobre pol ure potegne na 2200 metrov, pa nam omogoči hiter pobeg pred poletno vročino v dolini.
Okolje je visokogorsko in vreme spremenljivo. Topla oblačila, zaščitna krema za sonce, sončna očala ne bodo odveč. Vode ni.
Dostopi do sektorjev so označeni z možici, modro puščico in oznako VPPK (Visokogorski plezalni park Kanin).
V sektorjih Frenč, Trebuh, Vrtec in Skalarjeva plošča je priporočljiva čelada.
Pozna pomlad, poletje in jesen. Ko je v dolini pasja vročina, je tu zgoraj sveže. Skala se takoj posuši.

description.en:
The climbing area between Prebold and Trbovlje is very well equipped and offers different types of climbing.

In spring and autumn the rock lies in the sun in the morning, and in summer in the afternoon
it is possible to climb also during sunny winter days. It is too hot to climb in summer.
Climbers are asked to park their cars in the marked places, where they do not disturb the local traffic.
description.sl:
Plezališče med Preboldom in Trbovljami je odlično opremljeno in nudi resnično raznovrstno plezanje.

Pomladi in jeseni je skala dopoldne v soncu, poleti popoldne
možno je plezati tudi ob sončnih zimskih dneh. Poleti je lahko zelo vroče.
Upoštevajte označena parkirna mesta. Parkirajte tako, da ne boste ovirali prometa.

description.en:
There are two different rocks characteristic for this area: the grey limestone on one side and a conglomerate on the other. "Štenge" (Staircase), that leads to the foot of the crag shows the care taken by the local climbers for this interesting rocky formation in the middle of the wood.

Spring, summer and autumn.
description.sl:
Za plezališče sta značilni dve različni kamnini: na eni strani spran siv apnenec, na drugi pa konglomerat. 'Štenge', ki vodijo do urejenega vznožja, pa pričajo o skrbi lokalnih plezalcev za to zanimivo kamnito tvorbo sredi gozda.

Od pomladi do jeseni.

description.en:
The routes cross the water eroded slabs.

An interesting high-altitude climbing area on Korošica is just a couple of minutes' walk from the mountain hut Kocbeckov dom and offers predominantly easier routes in crags with excellent rock.
Accommodation
Mountain hut Kocbekov dom na Korošici (1808 m) burned down in 2017. A new hut is currently under construction.
June to October.
description.sl:
Prevladuje plezanje po ploščah s škrapljami in žlebiči.

Zanimivo visokogorsko plezališče le streljaj od Kocbeckovega doma na Korošici nudi pretežno lažje športnoplezalne smeri v odlični skali.
Prenočišče
Kocbekov dom na Korošici, 1808, je leta 2017 pogorel. Nova koča je v izgradnji!
Od junija do oktobra.

description.en:
The overhangs and stalactites of various forms and sizes offer difficulties from 6b up, and nearly all the routes require strength and stamina, some of them even gymnastic climbing. The most popular routes are quite polished. For the longest 40 m routes an 80 m rope is required.
Mišja peč is only 500 m from Osp. Together with the faces of Osp, the rocky amphitheatre of Mišja peč forms an almost continuous single climbing area. In recent years this overhanging semicircular wall has represented an important challenge to the numerous top climbers who come here from all over the world. But this does not mean that the others do not have anything to do here. Quite a few easier routes have been opened in the furthest left and right parts of the crag, which makes Mišja peč a more sensible option for those climbing in the lower grades.
Accommodation
Campsite Pri Vovku in Osp and several hostels, B&Bs, and other accommodation options in and around Osp.

It is possible to climb all year round but it is usually too hot in mid-summer. The right wall, however, remains in the shade until noon. The best time to go is undoubtedly in spring, autumn and during periods of settled winter weather. It is possible to climb here when it is raining but after prolonged rain some sections of the crag will be wet.

Please use the parking area beneath Mišja peč, payable with EasyPark's App.
5 €/day, 10 €/3 days, 15 €/7 days
description.sl:
Previsi in kapniki vseh oblik in velikosti nudijo težave v glavnem od 6b navzgor, vse smeri pa terjajo moč in vzdržljivost, nekatere skoraj akrobatsko plezanje. Oprimki najbolj plezanih smeri so precej zlizani. Najvišje smeri so dolge 40 m, zanje je potrebna 80-metrska vrv!
Izredno previsna polkrožna stena Mišje peči je le dobrih 500 metrov oddaljena od Ospa. Z osapskimi stenami tvori pravzaprav eno plezalno področje, ki se zaradi številnih kvalitetnih smeri že dolgo uvršča med najaktualnejša evropska plezališča, z izjemno koncentracijo težkih atletskih smeri v previsnih stenah pa predstavlja izziv vrhunskim plezalcem z vsega sveta. Z lažjimi smermi v skrajnem levem in desnem delu stene je plezališče zanimivo tudi za plezalce, ki se gibljejo v spodnjem delu težavnostne lestvice.
Prenočišče
Kamp Pri Vovku v Ospu ter številne prenočitvene možnosti v kraju in okoliških vaseh.
Najlepše je spomladi in jeseni ter ob toplih zimskih dneh brez vetra. V poletnem času desna polovica stene do poldneva ostane v senci, pozno popoldne pa je možno plezati v levem, tj. proti vzhodu orientiranem delu 'podkve'. Plezati je mogoče tudi v dežju, vendar so smeri po nekajdnevnem deževju vlažne in kapniki mokri.

Parkirišče pod Mišjo pečjo. Plačljivo z aplikacijoEasypark.si.
5 €/dan, 10 €/3 dni, 15 €/7 dni

routes.name: Za staro kolo in majhnega psa
Za star moped in hudga psa

description.en:
A smaller crag, which doesn't see much traffic due to Bitnje being so close (the two crags share the same parking space). Moderately difficult routes that follow natural features and have a somewhat alpine character as a result.

From spring to autumn. You can also climb in summer, but only after 4 p.m. when the wall comes into shade.

Keep an eye out for snakes in the summer.
description.sl:
Šavnica je manjše plezališče, ki je zaradi bližine Bitenj, s katerimi si deli tudi parkirišče, nekoliko zapostavljeno. Smeri zmernih težavnosti večinoma potekajo po naravnih razčlembah in imajo zato tudi nekoliko "hribovski karakter".

Od pomladi do jeseni. Plezanje je mogoče tudi poleti, vendar šele po 15 h, ko je stena v senci.
V toplejših mesecih lahko naletite na kače.

description.en:
An excellently equipped and popular crag with flowy routes, a short approach, and plenty of shade. Mostly vertical and slightly overhanging routes.

From late spring to early autumn. The wall is slow to dry after heavy rain.
Make sure to park your car so that you're not in the way of traffic and forestry workers.
description.sl:
Odlično opremljeno in priljubljeno plezališče pod Babjim zobom je zaradi plezljivih smeri, kratkega dostopa in senčne lege dobro obiskano. Prevladujejo navpične in rahlo previsne smeri.

Od pozne pomladi do zgodnje jeseni. Po močnem deževju se stena suši počasi.
Parkirajte tako, da ne ovirate prometa in gozdarskih del.

description.en:
Difficult and slightly overhanging routes prevail in the central part of the face, to the left and right the rock is more varied.
The climbing area is situated on the southern slope of Cicelj, in the immediate vicinity of the village Križevska vas. From the top of the routes you will be rewarded with a nice view of the Sava valley.

Early spring to late autumn. In summer, the crags are in shade after 5 pm. After heavy rainfall the face dries in two to three days.
There is a small car park for 4-5 cars. If it is full, leave your car at the church in Križevska vas.
description.sl:
V osrednjem delu stene prevladujejo težje, rahlo previsne smeri, v levem in desnem delu pa je stena bolj razčlenjena.
Plezališče se nahaja na južnem pobočju Ciclja, v neposredni bližini Križevske vasi. Z vrha smeri se odpre čudovit razgled na dolino reke Save.

Od zgodnje pomladi do pozne jeseni. Poleti je stena v senci po 17. uri. Po obilnejšem deževju se stena posuši v dveh do treh dneh.
Parkirišče je majhno, za 4-5 avtomobilov. Če je zasedeno, je najbolje parkirati pri cerkvi v Križevski vasi.

description.en:
The small crag is of an extremely local character. In the left part of the crag easier routes prevail, while to the right medium grade routes cross slightly overhanging slabs.
You can park along the road section that flattens out a good kilometre before Drežnica, with a large meadow to the right. Find the path at the very beginning of the flat land. It leads through the wood above the meadow and is marked by red lines.
An ideal summer crag thanks to its shady northern position in the forest. After rain the rock dries slowly.
description.sl:
Majhno plezališče izrazito lokalnega značaja. V levem delu prevladujejo lažje smeri, v desnem pa rahlo previsne plošče poskrbijo za višje ocene.
Parkiramo ob cesti dober kilometer pred Drežnico, kjer se cesta zravna, na desni pa imamo velik travnik. Stezo poiščemo na samem začetku ravnine. Poteka po gozdu tik nad travnikom. Označena je z rdečimi črtami.
Zaradi severne lege in gozda je plezališče idealno za vroče poletne dni. Skala se suši počasi.

description.en:
This interesting face under the southern slopes of Porezen is rarely visited owing to its remoteness. The crag has been re-equipped. Most routes follow cracks.

From May to October. In the morning the face is in shade. After longer pe riods of rain, except cracks, the rock dries quickly.
Park at the foot of the crag!
description.sl:
Zanimiva stena pod južnimi pobočji Porezna je zaradi odmaknjenosti deležna manjšega obiska. Plezališče je preopremljeno, večina smeri poteka po počeh.

Od maja do oktobra. Dopoldne je stena v senci. Po dolgotrajnem deževju se razen poči skala hitro posuši.
Parkirajte pod steno!

description.en:
Due to its overhanging wall, this typical summer crag offers a possibility to climb also in the rain. Difficult and overhanging routes prevail in the crag. The rock is not always of the best quality. Because of the cool air, coming out of the cave under the wall, it can be quite cold even in mid summer. A peculiarity of Šeginov potok is a rare combination of the private ownership of the crag and the protected area, access depends highly upon the maturity of the visitors.

Summer and warm autumn. During the humid days damp gathers on the rock.
The area of the crag and the cave counts among the natural monuments of the community of Slovenska Bistrica, therefore a special regime of protection is valid. Please leave the crag behind, as you found it. This holds especially for the cave entrance and the immediate neighbourhood of the cave Belojača, the longest horizontal karst cave in the Haloze.
The crag lies completely on private land, so the permission for climbing has been given by the owner under following conditions:
Pay respect while parking, approaching and climbing.
Close to the wall, the nearest neighbours have a reservoir of drinking water in the brook - any kind of pollution is strictly forbidden.
There is a pair of ravens nesting in the wall for years. The owner of the wood would like to keep them also in the future - his permission for climbing is based also on this condition.
Climbing restrictions
Due to the nesting of the raven there is a ban on climbing in the wall between 1st February and 15th May.
Any changes on the wall are forbidden - don't write the names of the routes on the wall, don't leave the carabiners and slings on the routes ...
Don't break branches and remove moss and ivy, unless they are disturbing you while climbing.
description.sl:
Značilno poletno plezališče zaradi previsnosti nudi možnost plezanja tudi ob dežju. Prevladujejo težje previsne smeri. Ponekod je skala slabše kakovosti. Zaradi hladnega zraka, ki izhaja iz jame pod steno, nas lahko sredi poletja pošteno zazebe. Posebnost Šeginovega potoka je redka kombinacija privatnega lastništva plezališča in zaščitenega področja, katerega plezalska prihodnost je v veliki meri odvisna od zrelosti obiskovalcev.

Poletje in topla jesen. Ob vlažnih dneh se na skali nabira kondenz.
Področje plezališča in jame sodi med naravne znamenitosti občine Slovenska Bistrica, zato zanj velja poseben varstveni režim. Prepovedani so kakršnikoli posegi v prostor, na kratko - plezališče moramo zapustiti takšno, kot je bilo ob našem prihodu. Še posebej to velja za jamski vhod in neposredno okolico jame Belojače, ki je najdaljša horizontalna kraška jama v Halozah.
Plezališče leži v celoti na privatnem zemljišču, zato lastnik dovoljenje za plezanje pogojuje s sledečimi pravili obnašanja:
Obzirnost pri parkiranju, dostopu in plezanju.
Tik pod steno imajo v potoku bližnji sosedje zajetje pitne vode za lokalni vodovod - vsakršno onesnaževanje je prepovedano.
V steni že vrsto let gnezdi par krokarjev. Lastnik gozda ju želi ohraniti tudi v bodoče in s tem tudi pogojuje dovoljenje za plezanje.
Prepovedi in omejitve
Med 1. februarjem in 15. majem je plezanje v steni zaradi gnezdenja krokarja prepovedano.
Zaradi vodnega zajetja je pod steno in nad vodnim zajetjem prepovedano smetenje in opravljanje male ali velike potrebe.
Prepovedano je spreminjanje zunanje podobe stene - pisanje imen smeri po steni, puščanje vponk, vrvic v smereh...
Ne lomimo vej, ne odstranjujmo mahu in bršljana, ki nas med plezanjem ne moti.

description.en:
The imposing face above the village of Bitnje is arguably one of the best and most popular crags of the Gorenjska region. It has plenty of long, slabby routes of all difficulties. Most of the climbing is stamina based and the routes are slightly overhanging and on good rock.

All year round but in summer it is better to go after 4 p.m. to avoid the heat. The best period is from September to May as the face remains in the sun.
Watch out for snakes in the summer!
description.sl:
Markantna stena nad vasjo Bitnje je verjetno eno najboljših in najbolj obiska-nih gorenjskih plezališč. Zanj je značilno plezanje dolgih smeri v plateh vseh težavnosti. Prevladujejo vzdržljivostne, mestoma rahlo previsne smeri v dobri skali.

Od pomladi do jeseni. Plezanje je mogoče tudi poleti, vendar šele po 15 h, ko je stena v senci.
Obiskovalci lahko v toplejših mesecih naletijo na kače, zato previdnost ne bo odveč.

routes.name: Jera je bunka, Janez jo tunka

description.en:
The main characteristics of this climbing area are more or less steep slabs of excellent grey limestone. The routes in the sector Rumena are also overhanging and sustained.
Above the small town of Vipava, on the southern slope of Gradiška Tura, are several scattered crags with very good rock and interesting easier routes. It is one of the few climbing areas in Slovenia which offers easier multi-pitch routes. The grades are quite severe and on average lower than elsewhere.
Accommodation
Camp site Tura at the parking lot, is open all year round.
Kamp Tura,Gradišče pri Vipavi 14a, 5271 Vipava,
phone: 00386 (0)5 99 300 67,
www.kamp-tura.si, info@kamp-tura.si

Autumn through to spring. During the winter it is best to climb in the sheltered sectors N, O and R. However, in summer it is best to climb in the morning when the majority of the routes are still in shade.
description.sl:
Za Vipavo je značilno plezanje v bolj ali manj strmih plateh in odličnem sivem apnencu, sektor Rumena pa ponuja tudi vzdržljivostno plezanje v previsni rumeni steni.
Na južnem pobočju Gradiške Ture nad Vipavo je raztresenih veliko sten z zanimivimi lažjimi in srednje težkimi smermi, ki jih odlikuje odlična skala. Je eno redkih plezališč pri nas, ki ponuja tudi več raztežajev dolge lažje smeri. Ocene so navite in v povprečju nekoliko nižje kot drugod.
Prenočišče
Kamp Tura ob parkirišču, odprt vse leto.
Kamp Tura, Gradišče pri Vipavi 14a, 5271 Vipava
tel. 00386 (0)5 99 300 67,
www.kamp-tura.si, info@kamp-tura.si

Od jeseni do pomladi. Pozimi je ob močni burji možno plezati v sektorjih N, O in R. Poleti je najbolje plezati dopoldne, ko je večina smeri v senci.

description.en:
Nomenj could be a wonderful beginners' crag, but the crag is poorly equipped and overgrown. The cave in sector B has plenty of potential for many difficult lines. There's a small spring (drinking water) in the left part of sector A.

Summer. It is possible to climb here when it is raining, but after longer periods of rain the rock dries slowly.
Park in front of the former shop.It is recommended to wear a helmet in the chimney. In the overhang, it is not possible to remove quickdraws during a descent, but only as second on the top rope.
description.sl:
Plezališče, ki ima sicer velik potencial in je po težavnosti namenjeno predvsem začetnikom, je trenutno slabo urejeno in zaraščeno. V sektorju B okoli votline je veliko možnosti za težje smeri. Na levi strani sektorja A je majhen izvir s pitno vodo.

Poleti. Možno je plezati tudi v dežju, vendar se po dolgotrajnih padavinah skala dlje časa suši.
Parkirišče je pred nekdanjo trgovino. Za plezanje v kaminu je priporočljiva čelada. V previsu ni možno izpenjati med spustom, ampak kot drugi v navezi.

description.en:
The routes follow inclined and vertical slabs, but there are also some interesting overhangs in the sector C.
The crag is situated in the vicinity of Idrija or more precisely the turning for Žiri. The walls can be seen from the other side of the Idrijca river. As the crag has been recently opened, the rock on some routes still needs some cleaning, and care should be taken especially on the upper sector.

From spring to late autumn. In the summer, sector A lies in shade, but in the upper sector C, it can be pleasantly warm also during late autumn afternoons.
The crag is situated on private land and climbers should respect the owners' good will. The access depends greatly upon the maturity of the climbers.
It is obligatory to park in front of EuroSpin or in the car parks along the main road.
There is a road under the wall
so try not to dislodge any rock.
description.sl:
Prevladujejo položne in navpične plošče, v sektorju C pa je tudi nekaj zanimivih previsnih smeri.
Plezališče se nahaja v neposredni bližini Idrije oziroma odcepa za Žiri, stene pa so lepo vidne že z nasprot nega brega reke Idrijce. Ker je plezališče novejšega datuma, skala še ni povsod očiščena, zato je predvsem v zgornjem sektorju potrebna previdnost.

Od pomladi do pozne jeseni, saj je poleti sektor A v senci, v zgornjem, C sektorju pa je še v pozni jeseni popoldne prijetno toplo na soncu.
Pazi na red in čistočo, saj se plezališče nahaja na privatnem zemljišču. Od obnašanja nas samih je odvisno, ali bodo stene tudi v bodoče na voljo plezalcem.
Parkiraj pri trgovini EuroSpin ali na parkiriščih ob glavni cesti.
Ne proži kamenja, saj je pod plezališčem cesta.

description.en:
It is the first equipped crag in the region of Zasavje with the easily visible silhouette of a chamois on the top. The local crag is protected with resin bolts and offers difficult climbing on vertical slabs. Rarely visited.

Summer and autumn.
description.sl:
Gre za prvo urejeno plezališče v Zasavju, katerega vrh krasi že od daleč dobro vidna silhueta gamsa. V tem lokalnem, z lepljenimi klini opremljenem in redko obiskanem plezališču se je mogoče poskusiti v težkem plezanju po navpičnih plateh.

Poletje in jesen.

description.en:
The crag below the village of Bodešče is situated in a quiet and easily accessible place along the Sava River. However, it is necessary to get used to the vertical slabs of good rock and the usual upside down handholds! It requires more than just strength to climb high. Such as good footwork!

Thanks to a sunny position it is possible to climb all year round. Anyway, the best periods are spring and autumn. After rain the crag dries quickly.
Beware of potential rockfall from the top of the wall. Keep an eye out for snakes in the summer.
description.sl:
Plezališče pod Bodeščami se nahaja na mirnem in lahko dostopnem kraju ob reki Savi. Na večinoma navpične smeri z zaobljenimi in navzdol obrnjenimi oprimki se je treba najprej navaditi. Zgolj z močjo ne boste prišli visoko.

Zaradi sončne lege je v Bodeščah možno plezati preko celega leta. Najlepše je spomladi in jeseni. Stena se tudi po obilnejšem deževju hitro posuši.
Pazljivo zaradi morebitnega padajočega kamenja z vrha stene! V toplejših mesecih lahko naletimo na kače.

description.en:
The crag is situated immediately above the Soča River near the hamlet of Trenta. Sharp water-eroded rock offers interesting and diverse climbing in real mountain surroundings.
Fot the majority of the routes a 60 m rope is required. In the middle of the longest routes there is an abseil chain.
In summer in the afternoon, and in spring and autumn in the morning. The right part of the face dries quickly after rain, while the left part takes two days to dry.
description.sl:
Plezališče leži tik nad Sočo v neposredni bližini zaselka Trenta. Ostra in od vode razjedena skala nudi zanimivo in raznovrstno plezanje v pravem gorskem ambientu.
Za večino smeri je potrebna 60-metrska vrv. Pri najdaljših smereh je sredi stene urejena veriga, da se lahko med spustom prevežemo.
Poleti popoldne, spomladi in jeseni pa dopoldne. Desni del stene se po deževju hitro posuši, levi del pa po dveh dneh.

description.en:
The crag is very small, very local.

All year round, except in summer at noon.
Note
Climbing is forbidden to the left of the route AČ, as those routes are right above a road.
description.sl:
Plezališče je izrazito lokalnega značaja.

Vse leto, razen poleti opoldne.
Levo od smeri AČ je plezanje prepovedano z občinskim odlokom, saj smeri potekajo tik nad cesto!

description.en:
The crags are just a 15 minutes' walk from the mountain hut Frischaufov dom na Okrešlju and are still being developed. The rock is excellent and a 70 m rope is required.
Accommodation
Frischaufov dom na Okrešlju (1378 m) burned down in 2019 and is currently closed.
Summer and autumn. It can get very hot in the summer and the wall doesn't come into shade until 5 p.m. At the start of the summer, the routes in the central part of the crag are often inaccessible due to snow left over from winter.
description.sl:
Plezališče leži 15 minut hoda od Frischaufovega doma na Okrešlju in je trenutno še v nastajanju. Skala je odlična
za najdaljše smeri potrebujemo 70-metrsko vrv.
Prenočišče
Frischaufov dom na Okrešlju, 1378 m. Zgorel leta 2019 in je trenutno zaprt!
Jesen in poletje. Poleti zna biti vroče, stena je v senci šele po 17 h. V zgodnjem poletju nam plazni stožec lahko onemogoči dostop do smeri v osrednjem delu plezališča.

description.en:
There are many possibilities on varied rock for beginners, for family visits or warming up on the crags of the Hotel Bellevue.

From late spring to early autumn. In the summer it is better to climb in the afternoon as the crags face east.
The parking lot behind Hotel Jezero is fee-paying.
description.sl:
Plezališče pri hotelu Bellevue je s svojo dobro razčlenjeno skalo odlična izbira za začetnike, družinske obiske ali pa za lažje poplezavanje.

Od pozne pomladi do zgodnje jeseni
zaradi svoje vzhodne lege so stene poleti za plezanje primerne šele popoldne.
Parkirišče za hotelom Jezero je plačljivo.

description.en:
The excellent equipped crag for beginners is situated in the northeast part of Vransko, in the immediate vicinity of the factory Inde.
Accommodation
Camp Podgrad Vransko.

From spring to autumn, also in dry winters.
