As the crag lies in the middle of the town, please respect the privacy of the inhabitants and don't be too noisy. Park at the car park in front of the factory Inde. Take the path to the left of the enclosure and not in the middle of a green plot.
description.sl:
Odlično opremljeno plezališče za začetnike leži v severovzhodnem delu Vranskega v neposredni bližini tovarne Inde.
Prenočišča
Kamp Podgrad Vransko.
Od pomladi do jeseni, ob suhih zimah tudi pozimi.
Stena leži sredi naselja, zato spoštujte domačine in ne zganjajte nepotrebnega hrupa. Najbolje je parkirati na parkirišču tovarne Inde. Do stene dostopajte po poti levo ob ogradi in ne po sredini zelenice.

description.en:
The routes cross vertical slabs and overhangs on good rock with many stalactites. Re-equipped also the aid route over the roof.
The crag is situated under the top of Kopitec above a big terrace formed by the Soča River. The mostly easier routes and the crag's position in interesting surroundings make it great for a short family visit or beginners.
The approach has been marked by pictograms. Follow the way to the Kozjak waterfall till a stone bridge. 30 metres ahead turn left towards Magozd.
Autumn, winter (when there is not too much snow) and spring. There is usually too hot to climb during the summer. Very appropriate on sunny days in winter. After rain the rock dries in a day.
You can park in the parking area before the turn-off for the Koren campsite. Paid parking during peak tourist season.
description.sl:
Smeri potekajo po dobro razčlenjeni navpični plošči in previsih, so 'zasigane' in polne kapnikov.
Plezališče se nahaja pod vrhom Kopitca nad veliko teraso, ki jo je oblikovala reka Soča. Zaradi večinoma lažjih smeri, razgledne lege in slikovite okolice je zelo primerno za kratek družinski izlet in začetnike.
Dostop je označen. Sledimo poti za slap Kozjak. 30 metrov za kamnitim mostom zavijemo levo proti Magozdu.
Jesen, zima (kadar je malo snega) in pomlad. Poleti je čez dan večinoma prevroče. Zelo primerno tudi ob sončnih zimskih dneh. Skala se po dežju posuši v enem dnevu, ob močnem soncu pa tudi prej.

Parkiramo lahko na parkirišču pred odcepom za kamp Koren. V času glavne turistične sezone je parkiranje plačljivo!

description.en:
Sector A (Balvan, Boulder): short, intense, and technically demanding routes on small hand and footholds.
Sector B (Pod cerkvijo, Beneath the church): the longest routes of the crag
good holds on overhanging to verti-cal terrain. The routes on the right are more intense.
Sector C (Mlinski kamen, Millstone): varied routes starting on down-facing holds that become better higher up.
The walls of this crag form a semicircle around the church of St. Volar. The whole place is incredibly beautiful and the Nadiža River, one of the warmest and cleanest Slovenian Alpine rivers, runs nearby, making this a great summer option.

The best conditions can be found in the spring and autumn
the B sector, which faces north, is great for hot summer days. The walls can stay wet after long periods of rain, especially the B sector. Sectors A, C, and D face east and are in the sun on spring and autumn mornings
in the summer, they come into shade after two p.m.
It is forbidden to drive into Kred and the observance of this regulation is checked by local traffic wardens. Paid parking in the summer because of the nearby bathing area. Local climbers cross the river by wading through shal-low water. As the rock in sector D is still a bit loose, it is recommended to wear a helmet.
description.sl:
A - Balvan: krajše, intenzivne in tehnično zahtevne smeri po majhnih oprimkih in stopih.
B - Pod cerkvijo: najdaljše smeri
pote-kajo po dobrih oprimkih čez sprva previsno, proti vrhu pa navpično steno. Smeri na skrajni desni so bolj intenzivne.
C - Mlinski kamen: zelo raznovrstne smeri potekajo prvih nekaj metrov po negativnih oprimkih, potem pa po bolj razčlenjeni steni.
Stene plezališča so v polkrogu posejane okoli cerkve sv. Volarja. Zaradi izrednega okolja in Nadiže, ki velja za eno najto-plejših in najčistejših alpskih rek, je to tudi prvovrsten poletni izletniški cilj.

Najboljše razmere so spomladi in jeseni, sektor B, ki gleda na sever, pa je idealno poletno plezališče. Po dolgotrajnem deževju ostanejo stene dlje časa mokre, še posebej sektor B. Sektorji A, C in D so obrnjeni proti vzhodu in imajo spomladi in jeseni dopoldansko sonce, poleti pa so v senci po 14 h.

Dostop z avtomobilom v Kred je prepo-vedan
spoštovanje uredbe nadzirajo redarji. Parkirišče je v poletni sezoni zaradi kopališča plačljivo! Lokalci upora-bljajo dostop preko plitve vode brez mosta. Sektor D je še svež, zato se lahko še kaj odkruši (čelada!).

description.en:
The crag is visited by steadily increasing numbers of climbers. The majority of the routes is nice and well protected, despite this, it is recommended to wear a helmet while belaying under longer routes.

All year round. On hot summer days in the afternoon, on colder sunny days in the morning. In the sectors B/I and B/ II it is possible to climb also when it is raining. The wall dries quickly.
On warm days you might be surprised by snakes below the wall. The routes in sectors D and E start from exposed ledges (steel cable on the approach), therefore move carefully at the foot of the routes. Due to the lack of space the sector becomes crowded with only two parties on the ledge.
description.sl:
Plezališče je deležno vedno večjega obiska. Smeri so večinoma lepe in dobro opremljene, kljub temu pa je vsaj pod daljšimi smermi za plezalce pod steno priporočljiva uporaba čelade.

Plezati je možno vse leto. Ob vročih dneh popoldne, ob hladnejših sončnih dneh dopoldne, v sektorjih B/I in B/II tudi v rahlem dežju. Stena se hitro suši.
Pod steno nas lahko ob toplih dneh presenetijo kače.
Smeri v sektorjih D in E se začnejo na izpostavljenih policah (jeklenica na dostopu), zato previdno pri gibanju pod steno. Zaradi pomanjkanja prostora pod smermi več kot dve navezi v sektorju že pomenita gnečo!

description.en:
The climbing area is situated at the foot of the slope to the right of the Boka Waterfall. It is also possible to climb here in winter.

All year round
but it is usually too hot in mid-summer.
There is a parking place in front of the inn Žvikar.
description.sl:
Lokalno plezališče se nahaja ob vznožju pobočja desno od slapa Boka. V njem je možno plezati tudi v zimskem času.

Vse leto
poleti je ponavadi prevroče.
Parkirišče je pred gostilno Žvikar.

description.en:
Most of the routes in the Iglica sector are on vertical slabs with small hand and footholds
the left part of the crag has some enjoyable and varied routes of easier grades. The Nova Bela sector is suitable for more experienced climbers.
The extensive climbing area of Bohinjska Bela with well equipped routes counts amongst the best in Slovenia. The excellent rock and routes of different grades attract more and more climbers.

The best time to climb on Iglica is in spring, autumn, and on dry and warm winter days. The face dries quickly, even after longer periods of rain. The best periods for Bohinjska Bela are late spring, summer, and autumn. In the summer, Iglica is in the shade in the afternoon and Nova Bela after around 12 o'clock.
Access by car along the road that runs at the foot of the sector Bohinjska Bela is strictly forbidden. It is obli-gatory to park in front of the shop in Bohinjska Bela or in the car park in front of the church. It is not allowed to park anywhere else. The observance of these regulations is checked by local traffic wardens.
description.sl:
V Iglici prevladujejo navpične plati z minimalnimi oprimki in stopi, v levem delu pa lepo razgibane in všečne lahke smeri. Nova Bela je primernejša za boljše plezalce.
Stene nad Bohinjsko Belo s svojimi dobro opremljenimi smermi, odlično skalo in širokim razponom težav upra-vičeno sodijo med najboljša plezališča pri nas.

V Iglici je najlepše spomladi, jeseni, pa tudi v suhih in sončnih zimah. Stena se tudi po dolgotrajnem deževju zelo hitro posuši. Bohinjska Bela je primerna pozno spomladi, poleti in jeseni. Poleti je Iglica v senci popoldne, Nova Bela pa po 12 h.
Zaradi oviranja prehoda in dela lastni-kov gozdov na cesti, ki vodi pod sektor Bohinjska Bela, je vsakršen dostop z osebnimi vozili pod steno prepovedan.Parkiramo lahko pred trgovino ali na parkirišču pri cerkvi. Parkiranje izven označenih parkirišč ni dovoljeno. Spoštovanje prepovedi vožnje po gozdni cesti in parkiranje nadzoruje občinsko redarstvo.

description.en:
The crag is excellently bolted and the climbing is mostly on vertical slabs. One of the hidden gems of the Gorenjska region.
The crag is located in a forest beneath Prtovč, next to a waymarked path from the village of Jasenovec to Prtovč and Ratitiovec.
The approach from Prtovč is downhill (20 min), but you have to walk back up (30 min) after you've finished climbing. The approach from Jesenovec down in the valley is slightly longer (40 minutes), but you'll be going downhill (25 min) back to your car, plus you won't have to drive up to Prtovč.
Summer. The wall lies in the forest and is pleasantly fresh, no doubt helped by of the altitude. In the summer, the face comes into shade after 4 p.m. The crag is not appropriate for rainy periods.
description.sl:
V odlično urejenem plezališču prevladujejo navpične plošče. Eno izmed bolj podcenjenih gorenjskih plezališč.
Plezališče leži v gozdu pod Prtovčem ob markirani poti, ki vodi iz zaselka Jesenovec na Prtovč in naprej na Ratitovec.
Dostop poteka s Prtovča poteka navzdol (20 min), povratek pa navzgor (30-min). Iz Jesenovca v dolini bomo hodili malo dlje (40 min vzpona), zato bo pa povratek v sestopu (25 min), pa še vožnjo do Prtovča si bomo prihranili.
Poletje. Steno zakriva gozd, za prijeten hlad pa poskrbi tudi nadmorska višina. Poleti je senca po 16 h. To izrazito poletno plezališče ni primerno za mokra obdobja.

description.en:
Near Nova Gorica, the walls of Lijak rise high above the Vipava Valley, offering excellent rock and a very nice view. The main wall is nearly 70 m high. A new sector (Loke) has recently been developed
it's located just above the cart track leading to the main wall.

Best period Late autumn, winter and early spring. The crag is well sheltered from the wind.
Climbing restrictions
The climbing area is a part of a natural park and due to the nesting of the birds, the development of new routes without the permission of the ecologists is strictly forbidden. There are no larger parking spaces in the village. We recommend that you park your car at the church, but make sure to leave enough space for people visiting the cemetery. There's another (smaller) parking space just before the start of the cart track leading to Lijak.
description.sl:
V bližini Nove Gorice se visoko nad Vipavsko dolino dvigajo stene Lijaka, zato plezališče poleg odlične skale odlikuje tudi izreden razgled. Osrednja stena je visoka skoraj 70 metrov. Novejši spodnji sektor Loke leži tik nad kolovozom, ki vodi h glavni steni.

Pozna jesen, zima in zgodnja pomlad. Zavetrna lega plezališča omogoča plezanje tudi ob močni burji.
Prepovedi
Stene Lijaka spadajo v območje naravnega parka, v katerem je zaradi gnezdenja ptic nadelava smeri brez dovoljenja strogo prepovedana. Pravega prostora za parkiranje v vasi ni. Najuporabnejše je parkirišče pred cerkvijo, kjer pa je treba pustiti prostor za obiskovalce pokopališča. Druga možnost je majhno parkirišče pred odcepom kolovoza proti Lijaku.

description.en:
From the road through the narrow and picturesque gorge of the Dovžanova soteska the crags lie some 200 m above the Tržiška Bistrica River where they are hidden in the forest and nearly invisible. In 1979 the first difficult free climbs where put up and later the first routes of the IXth grade. The majority of the routes are slightly overhanging with small handholds and they require very precise footwork.

Spring, summer and autumn. In the summer most of the face is in shade. During dry and sunny days in winter you can climb pitches at the top of the wall in the sun.
There is loose rock on some of the multi-pitch routes and the right-hand sector (Upokojenski), especially on ledges, so please consider other people below you.
description.sl:
S ceste skozi ozko in slikovito Dovžanovo sotesko je plezališče skorajda neopazno, saj je skrito v gozdu približno 200 metrov nad Tržiško Bistrico. Leta 1979 so bile v njem prosto preplezane prve težje smeri, tu pa so nastale tudi prve smeri devete stopnje. Večina smeri je rahlo previsna z majhnimi oprimki in zahteva predvsem natančno plezanje.

Pomlad, poletje in zgodnja jesen. Poleti je večji del stene v senci. Ob suhi in sončni zimi pa lahko ujamete okoli poldneva nekaj prijetnih plezalnih uric v raztežajih pod robom stene.
V večraztežajnih smereh in v desnem (Upokojenskem) sektorju je skala mestoma rahlo krušljiva, še posebej na policah, zato previdnost in skrb za vse, ki se nahajajo pod nami, ne bo odveč.

description.en:
The short face amongst the woods offers easier routes, suitable for all those, to whom the climbing in the nearby climbing area of Burjakove peči seems too difficult. In the left part of the face the rock quality is poor.

Spring, summer and autumn.
Climbers are asked to park on the left side of the road before the brook. Parking is forbidden on the cart track that turns right in the woods before the brook. Private property!
description.sl:
Kratka stena sredi gozda nudi lažje smeri, primerne za vse tiste, katerim je plezanje v bližnjih Burjakovih pečeh pretrd oreh. V levem delu je skala slabše kvalitete. Imena smeri so povzeta iz Koroških pripovedk.

Pomlad, poletje, jesen.
Parkirajte le na levi strani ceste pred potokom. Na kolovozu, ki vodi pred potokom desno v gozd, je parkiranje prepovedano. Tako stena kot dostop do nje sta last kmetije Matvoz!

description.en:
This popular crag has many long and beautiful routes with positive handholds that require good climbing technique and stamina. The middle part of the wall also has some short, intense routes. The canyon on the left side has short bouldery routes (A), which are perfect for hot summer days when the main wall gets too hot to climb.

All year, especially in spring and autumn. It's also possible to climb on dry and sunny winter days, and in the summer the wall comes into shade after 4 p.m.
Watch out for ticks and snakes in the summer.
There's a path used by chamois above the upper part of the face so keep an eye out for falling rock. If you don't stray more than 5 meters from the foot of the crag, you should be safe, though.
description.sl:
Dobro obiskano steno Bitenj potoka odlikujejo večinoma dolge in lepe smeri s pozitivnimi oprimki, kjer pride do izraza tehnika gibanja in vzdržljivost. V srednjem delu stene je tudi nekaj kratkih in intenzivnih smeri. V kanjonu na levi se nahajajo kratke 'balvanske' smeri (A), ki so primerne za vroče pole-tne dni, ko je v steni prevroče.

Vse leto, zlasti pomladi in jeseni. Pozimi v sončnih dneh, poleti pa po 16. uri, ko je stena v senci.
Pozor pred klopi. Poleti nas pod steno lahko presenetijo kače. Nad zgornjo steno je gamsji prehod, zato obstaja možnost padajočega kame-nja. V 5-metrskem pasu ob steni je praviloma varno.

description.en:
The crag has a nice position above the river Sava between Litija and Zagorje and was equipped by the main local climber and author of new routes, Vili Guček. The rock varies from solid to excellent and offers slightly less friction than the limestone at the seaside area. It can still happen that some holds break off. The crag offers diverse climbing from inclined slabs to overhangs. Only roofs are missing.


May to June and September to October. The walls face southeast and are sunlit in the morning, therefore it is possible to climb also during the mild winter months. In the summer the majority of the routes are in the shade after 3 p.m. and the climbing is more reccomendable in the afternoon. It is possible to climb only on some routes when it is raining. After longer periods of rain, the routes remain wet.

You can meet snakes under the wall.
description.sl:
Plezališče z lepo lego nad reko Savo med Litijo in Zagorjem je delo glavnega zasavskega opremljevalca smeri Vilija Gučka. Skala niha od solidne do odlične in nudi za spoznanje manj trenja kot primorski apnenec. Ponekod se lahko kakšen oprimek še odlomi. Plezališče nudi zelo raznovrstno plezanje od položnih plati do previsov. Manjkajo le strehe.

Od maja do junija in od septembra do oktobra. Stene imajo jugovzhodno lego in dopoldansko sonce, kar omogoča tudi plezanje v ugodnih zimskih mesecih. Poleti je večina smeri v senci po 15. uri, plezanje pa je bolj priporočljivo popoldne. V dežju je možno plezati le v nekaterih smereh, po daljšem deževju ostanejo ponekod smeri še dolgo mokre.

Pod steno so doma tudi kače.

description.en:
In the middle of the idyllic surroundings near the village of Trenta, two large blocks with equipped routes are situated above the Soča. Alongside the river there are many blocks suitable for bouldering and some of them are even marked.
Beside the blocks around the crag, there is a bouldering area in the Soča riverbed below the campsite Trenta with about 30 boulder problems.
From late spring to early autumn.
As the access to the rocks is across private land, climbers should respect the privacy of the people who live here.
description.sl:
Sredi idiličnega okolja v bližini vasi Trenta tik nad Sočo stojita dva velika balvana z opremljenimi smermi. Sicer je predvsem ob reki navzdol še veliko možnosti za plezanje po balvanih. Nekateri so označeni.
Poleg balvanov v okolici plezališča je v strugi Soče pod Kampom Trenta balvansko plezališče z okoli 30 problemi.
Od pozne pomladi do zgodnje jeseni.
Ker dostop do balvanov vodi preko privatnega zemljišča, kjer pasejo drobnico, je obisk plezališča s psi prepovedan.

description.en:
This wide face is tucked away in a forest beneath the village of Koprivnik at the Pokljuka Plateau. The left part of the crag has harder (short and intense) routes and the right part is easier and more varied. The routes are still a bit dusty and hard to on-sight.

From late spring to late autumn, especially when the valley below is enveloped in fog. You can climb here in the winter as well, as long as there's no snow. Summer days are usually too hot.
The crag is accessed from a small parking space at a corner 200 meters after the 'Triglav National Park' sign-board. There's a meadow just down from the road. Walk along the forest and past a hunters lookout until you reach a logging track/road below. After the road turns right and heads down towards Nomenj, continue straight ahead and in just over a minute you'll reach a marked path leading to the base of the crag.
description.sl:
Razpotegnjena, v samotnem gozdu skrita stena leži pod pokljuško vasjo Koprivnik. V levem delu stene prevladujejo nekoliko težje, kratke in intenzivne smeri, desni del pa je lažji in bolj razgiban. Smeri so še nekoliko prašne in težje preplezljive na pogled.

Od pozne pomladi do pozne jeseni, zlasti ko bohinjska dolina tiči v megli. Tudi pozimi, če ni snega. Poleti je čez dan prevroče.
Dostop do stene vodi z majhnega parkirišča na ovinku, 200 metrov za tablo Triglavskega narodnega parka. Pod nami je travnik. Ob gozdu se spustimo mimo lovske preže do gozdne vlake/ceste pod nami. Ko ta zavije desno navzdol proti Nomnju, nadaljujemo naravnost in v dobri minuti na levi poiščemo označeno pot, ki nas pripelje pod steno.
